TopicTitle: Might be a silly question: What are the pink reticules on the attitude indicator

Articles.Content:
On my attitude indicator. (the thing that looks like this: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Attitude_indicator)

So I get how the green reticules represent my velocity vector. But for the life of me I cannot figure out what the pink reticules are.

Is it the acceleration vector? Sometimes it seems that way, but other times not. I tried to search for it here and on the wiki, but either I suck at searching or nobody else was confused by this.
The pink vectors point towards/away from the launchpad.

OOOOOOOH.

Ok. That\'s really handy.

Now begin my furious attempts to deorbit back to my launchpad.
